K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-0: @470b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-2: de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te; bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te; ;bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-4: rig pa dam pa 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-5: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-10: khyod kyis rig pa smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:470b-11: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis smra bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams @471a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-1: cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la phyag btsal te mchod pa byas nas rig pa smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-2: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: na ma manydzu shr'i ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-3: bo dhi satva ya aom manydza ba ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-14: aa bhi sa aa bhi sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-15: tu ta tu ta tru ta tru ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-18: na ma: sam bo dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-28: a'a bi sha aa bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-31: gang zhig gis nam phyed na lan gsum brjod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-32: nyi ma la yang lan bdun brjod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-33: rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-34: mi rnams kyis sho lo ka sum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-35: 'di'i cho ga ni tsandan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te zhun mar gyi mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-36: ma grub kyang sho lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-38: bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-027:471a-39: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dmod btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
